name: marimo
title: marimo.io
shortDescription: marimo is an innovative open-source Python notebook designed for modern developers. It integrates seamlessly with Git, supports reactive execution, and allows for the creation of interactive notebooks that can be shared as web apps. Ideal for data scientists and developers, marimo simplifies the process from development to production, making it easier to manage and share complex Python projects.
pros: Git integration for easy version control
Reactive execution to automate cell updates
Export options to WebAssembly for web sharing
cons: Potentially steep learning curve for beginners
Dependency on Python ecosystem for full functionality
